newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Lehman cautions on Aurum.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Lehman cautions on Aurum.

text.p: -- Lehman Brothers analyst Brian Skiba reiterated his outperform on Aurum Software Inc, but hinted at near-term pressure on the stock if Aurum customer MCI Communications Corp decides to switch from using Aurum software.

-- The analyst said MCI was in the process of re-evaluating Aurum's sales force automation contact management software with an eye to adopting a simpler, Internet-enabled product from a competing supplier.
-- Skiba said MCI has not confirmed whether it plans to switch, but that the issue "bears watching."
